fun.connor.lighter.compiler.step

Class CompilerStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.lighter.compiler.step.CompilerStep
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildModelStep, CodeGenerationStep, CollectDependenciesStep, CollectRequestGuardProducersStep, ReverseInjectorCodeGenerationStep, ValidateModelStep, ValidationStep

    public abstract class CompilerStep
extends java.lang.Object
    An individual model iteration. CompilerSteps declare dependencies on environment variables (stored in a step environment map) and produce a StepResult to map into the environment for future steps.
    This abstract class provides enforces a template for steps to use. It provides the generic implementations of environment validation for each step and declares abstract methods for step processing.
